about_the_game: Roses are red, violets are blue, mutants are ugly, so what do we do? Well, this time players will need to type increasingly more overblown and contrived sweet nothings in order to repel hordes of amorous mutants queuing up to give them a love bite they’ll never forget.
detailed_description: Roses are red, violets are blue, mutants are ugly, so what do we do? Well, this time players will need to type increasingly more overblown and contrived sweet nothings in order to repel hordes of amorous mutants queuing up to give them a love bite they’ll never forget.

fullgame.name: The Typing of The Dead: Overkill

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6450, NVIDIA GeForce GT 220 or Intel Integrated Graphics HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Roses are red, violets are blue, mutants are ugly, so what do we do? Well, this time players will need to type increasingly more overblown and contrived sweet nothings in order to repel hordes of amorous mutants queuing up to give them a love bite they’ll never forget.
